edge: The soundtrack album for Shazam! Fury of the Gods was released by WaterTower Music on March 10, 2023.
Composer Benjamin Wallfisch was previously involved in creating the music for Shazam!, but due to scheduling conflicts with another DCEU film, he could not return for Shazam! Fury of the Gods.
Composer Christophe Beck has already begun working on creating the music for Shazam! Fury of the Gods, following Benjamin Wallfisch's departure due to scheduling conflicts.
A single entitled 'Shazam! Fury of the Gods (Main Title Theme)' was released digitally by WaterTower Music on February 23, 2023.
